CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 23, 1958, pg. 3, reads: "Destruction From Inside - After the special racket squad had entered through the rear of 1622 Centre Ave., last Thursday and arrested the only person in the place, confiscated numbers slips and money, they proceeded to smash the glass in the window (right) and door (left), from inside the storeroom.  This act was unjustified as the door was not locked when the officers appeared for the raid, and nobody was in the room to escape through the window.  No explanation was given by the raiders for this glass-smashing spree. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Block building with broken glass in window and door, after police raid, 1622 Centre Avenue, Hill District
